title: Heat Propagation
description: Simulating the heating of a metal alloy with three subsections with different thermal characteristics in parallel using a relaxation algorithm.

title: Facility Layout with Genetic Algorithm
description: This program uses the idea of a genetic algorithm to finds the best possible placement for stations on a two dimensional space using concurrency.

title: Yelp Recommendation
description: A recommendation software that uses concepts of clustering, TF-IDF and Dijkstra's algorithm to find connect between similar businesses.

title: Parallel Performance Testing
description: Simulate an application in which a set of threads all rely on a shared collection of data, then compare the throughput of the program for 2 parallel data structure

title: Implementation of TCP Protocols
description: A TCP-based server-client system with sliding window, retransmission timeouts (RTO), XOR encryption, packet loss and reordering emulation, server-side caching, and custom TFIP based packets.
